detectors.description:
LotteryAdmin.setAdmin(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#112-114) should emit an event for: 
	- admin = _admin (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#113)

LotteryAdmin.proposeOwner(address)._owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#116) lacks a zero-check on :
		- proposedOwner = _owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#117)

LotteryAdmin.setAdmin(address)._admin (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#112) lacks a zero-check on :
		- admin = _admin (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#113)

LotteryAdmin.allowsAllowance() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#52-54) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now - lastAllowancePaymentTimestamp >= 86400 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/8302d67bdc44dc0457e0c80312142dd353c9948d_LotteryAdmin.sol#53)
